name: Braintree Technologies Sdn. Bhd.
description: Provider of drone services intended to bring precision and automation to agriculture. The company provides drone services and AI-powered computer vision algorithms and technologies in mapping, evaluation, design & planning, database development, and analysis for agricultural entities, enabling the agricultural industry to process satellite remote sensing data for searching new suitable land for plantation.
one_liner: Provider of drone services intended to bring precision and automation to agriculture. The company provides drone services and AI-powered computer vision algorithms and technologies in mapping, evaluation, design & planning, database development, and analysis for agricultural entities, enabling the agricultural industry to process satellite remote sensing data for searching new suitable land for plantation.
